description:
In today's collaborative, fast, and practical business environment, leadership can mean taking an action on a new idea, or coming up with a more effective and efficient way to reach your goals...etc In the 21st century, leadership is not just a top-down management. Leadership takes place at every level of every company or social group — from top down to bottom up.

Managing day-to-day duties and achieving key goals can be quite a challenge, especially when working with professionals who don't report to you. To succeed, leaders need to find new ways to influence, persuade, collaborate and get buy-in for their vision and goals

To explore these emerging concepts of business leadership, eSoft Skills offers Leadership and Influence, a course focused on developing the management and interpersonal tools that you can use to join forces with and motivate others toward a common goal.

Learning Objectives:

  • Understand what “leadership" means
  • Explore the Great Man Theory
  • Explore the Trait Theory
  • Learn about Transformational Leadership
  • Learn how to adapt your leadership styles to the individuals you lead
  • Explore the concept of leading by Directing
  • Explore the concept of leading by Participating
  • Explore the concept of leading by Delegating
  • Understand Kouzes and Posner
  • Conduct a personal inventory
  • Implement an action plan
  • Set Personal Goals
title: Leadership & Influence Skills
